hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT P.DESCRIPTION FROM PROBLEMS P,ASSESSMENT_SCHEDULE A,CANDIDATE C WHERE P.PROBLEM_ID=A.PROBLEM_ID AND A.GROUP_ID=C.GROUP_ID AND C.CANDIDATE_ID=:candidateId AND (:time1 BETWEEN A.START_DATE AND A.END_DATE)
select P.problem_id,P.name from assessment_schedule A,problems P where A.problem_id=P.problem_id and group_id = :id
update assessment_schedule set enable = :? where group_id = :? and problem_id = :?
